item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @Wyrmcabbage Wyrmcabbage
item.description:
@Wyrmcabbage wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:108, topic:293439”][quote author=Wyrmcabbage link=topic=388301.msg3536735#msg3536735 date=1300597234]
Please help. I’m not smart like you guys so I don’t know how to fix this. I’m getting a white screen:

[code=java5]package ClientH4x;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

public class RSLoader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

    /**
     * Made By Omer Elnour/Remo on MoparIsTheBest: Wyrmcabbage
     * BIG THANKS to The Bank :D
 * 
 */
private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
	private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();

    public RSLoader() {
            try {
                    parameters.put("worldid", "54");
                    parameters.put("members", "0");
                    parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
                    parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
                    parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOfSioVfCQagIWtHEqGOCcTkj338a649PWg");
                    parameters.put("lang", "0");
           
                    ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(
                                            new URL[] { new URL(
                                                            "http://world54.runescape.com/runescape.jar")

});
Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass(“client”);
Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();
loader.setStub(this);

                    setTitle("Runescape Client ~ By Wyrmcabbage");
                    JPanel theGame = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
                    theGame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(768, 560));
                    setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
                    setSize(768, 560);
                    loader.init();
                    loader.start();
                    theGame.add(loader);
                    getContentPane().add(theGame, BorderLayout.CENTER);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

    public void appletResize(int width, int height) { }

    public final URL getCodeBase() {
            try {
                    return new URL("http://world54.runescape.com/");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    return null;
            }
    }

    public final URL getDocumentBase() {
            try {
                    return new URL("http://world54.runescape.com/");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    return null;
            }
    }

    public final String getParameter(String name) {
            return parameters.get(name);
    }

    public final AppletContext getAppletContext() {
            return null;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
    	java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new RSLoader().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

}[/code]

I know the “parameters are fuxd” but how do I fix that?
[/quote]

Have Fun!

[quote] document.write('name=RuneScape ');
document.write('id=game ');
document.write('width=“100%” ');
document.write('height=“100%” ');
document.write('alt=“Please visit http://www.runescape.com/kbase/guid/the_game_won_t_load for assistance” ');

document.write('archive=loader-1288657538.jar code=loader.class ');

document.write(‘mayscript>’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);

document.write(’’);

document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
if (haveie6) document.write(’’);
else document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’<param name=cookieprefix value=>’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);

document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);

document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’<param name=sskey value=>’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);
document.write(’’);

document.write(’’);
[/quote][/quote]

[code=java5]package ClientH4x;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

public class RSLoader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

    /**
     * Made By Omer Elnour/Remo on MoparIsTheBest: Wyrmcabbage
     * BIG THANKS to The Bank :D
 * 
 */
private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
	private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();

    public RSLoader() {
            try {
                    parameters.put("worldid", "54");
                    parameters.put("members", "0");
                    parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
                    parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
                    parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOfSioVfCQagIWtHEqGOCcTkj338a649PWg");
                    parameters.put("lang", "0");
           
                    ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(
                                            new URL[] { new URL(
                                                            "http://world54.runescape.com/runescape.jar")

});
Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass(“client”);
Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();
loader.setStub(this);

                    setTitle("Runescape Client ~ By Wyrmcabbage");
                    JPanel theGame = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
                    theGame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(768, 560));
                    setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
                    setSize(768, 560);
                    loader.init();
                    loader.start();
                    theGame.add(loader);
                    getContentPane().add(theGame, BorderLayout.CENTER);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

    public void appletResize(int width, int height) { }

    public final URL getCodeBase() {
            try {
                    return new URL("http://world54.runescape.com/");
            } catch (Exception e) {

            }
    }

    public final URL getDocumentBase() {
            try {
                    return new URL("http://world54.runescape.com/");

                    return null;
            }
    }

    public final String getParameter(String name) {
            return parameters.get(name);
    }

    public final AppletContext getAppletContext() {
            return null;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
    	java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new RSLoader().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

}[/code]

I know the “parameters are fuxd” but how do I fix that?[/quote]

item.description:
@Wyrmcabbage wrote:

Please help. I’m not smart like you guys so I don’t know how to fix this. I’m getting a white screen:

[code=java5]package ClientH4x;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

public class RSLoader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

    /**
     * Made By Omer Elnour/Remo on MoparIsTheBest: Wyrmcabbage
     * BIG THANKS to The Bank :D
 * 
 */
private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
	private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();

    public RSLoader() {
            try {
                    parameters.put("worldid", "54");
                    parameters.put("members", "0");
                    parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
                    parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
                    parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOfSioVfCQagIWtHEqGOCcTkj338a649PWg");
                    parameters.put("lang", "0");
           
                    ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(
                                            new URL[] { new URL(
                                                            "http://world54.runescape.com/runescape.jar")

});
Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass(“client”);
Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();
loader.setStub(this);

                    setTitle("Runescape Client ~ By Wyrmcabbage");
                    JPanel theGame = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
                    theGame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(768, 560));
                    setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
                    setSize(768, 560);
                    loader.init();
                    loader.start();
                    theGame.add(loader);
                    getContentPane().add(theGame, BorderLayout.CENTER);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

    public void appletResize(int width, int height) { }

    public final URL getCodeBase() {
            try {
                    return new URL("http://world54.runescape.com/");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    return null;
            }
    }

    public final URL getDocumentBase() {
            try {
                    return new URL("http://world54.runescape.com/");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    return null;
            }
    }

    public final String getParameter(String name) {
            return parameters.get(name);
    }

    public final AppletContext getAppletContext() {
            return null;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
    	java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new RSLoader().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

}[/code]

I know the “parameters are fuxd” but how do I fix that?

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Jeff1234, post:105, topic:293439”]Hey guys… I know this thread is old but I really want to learn so here is my problem :

When running this code :

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.applet.AppletContext;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;

import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;

import java.util.HashMap;

import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.JFrame;

public class RSLoader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

	private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();
	private JPanel bot = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());

	public RSLoader(){
		setTitle("Hello Jagex");
		bot.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(768, 560));
		setSize(768, 560);
		setVisible(true);
		setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		setParameters();
		setUpLoader();
	}
	
	public void setParameters(){
		parameters.put("worldid", "128");
		parameters.put("members", "0");
		parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
		parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
		parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOfSioVfCQagIWtHEqGOCcTkj338a649PWg");
		parameters.put("lang", "0");
	}
	
	public void setUpLoader(){
		try{
			ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[]{new URL("http://world128.runescape.com/runescape.jar")});
			Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass("client");
			Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();
			loader.setStub(this);
			loader.init();
			loader.start();
			bot.add(loader);
			getContentPane().add(bot, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
	
	public static void main(String args[]){
		new RSLoader();
	}
	
	public void appletResize(int width, int height){
	}
	
	public final URL getCodeBase() {
		try{
			return new URL("http://world128.runescape.com/");
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			return null;
		}
	}
	
	public final URL getDocumentBase(){
		try{
			return new URL("http://world128.runescape.com/");
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			return null;
		}
	}
	
	public final String getParameter(String name){
		return parameters.get(name);
	}
	
	public final AppletContext getAppletContext(){
		return null;
	}
}

I get this error :

C:\Users\HP\Desktop\BOT>java RSLoader
ru
        at ve.a(Unknown Source)
        at client.init(Unknown Source)
        at RSLoader.setUpLoader(RSLoader.java:46)
        at RSLoader.<init>(RSLoader.java:28)
        at RSLoader.main(RSLoader.java:57)

Anyone have any idea why I get this ?.. The code is the same as the tutorial so I was wondering maybe jagex changed there system so it doesn’t work anymore ? Help please

Edit : Nvm fixed :)… If anyone get the same problem post and I will post code :)[/quote]Heyyyyy Buddy! Whats happening my unkowning amingo>

K so heres the dealio, the paramaters are fuxd. Kool? Kool. Search for dynamically determing parameters or something goofy like that!

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @Jeff1234 Jeff1234
item.description:
@Jeff1234 wrote:

Hey guys… I know this thread is old but I really want to learn so here is my problem :

When running this code :

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.applet.AppletContext;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;

import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;

import java.util.HashMap;

import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.JFrame;

public class RSLoader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

	private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();
	private JPanel bot = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());

	public RSLoader(){
		setTitle("Hello Jagex");
		bot.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(768, 560));
		setSize(768, 560);
		setVisible(true);
		setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		setParameters();
		setUpLoader();
	}
	
	public void setParameters(){
		parameters.put("worldid", "128");
		parameters.put("members", "0");
		parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
		parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
		parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOfSioVfCQagIWtHEqGOCcTkj338a649PWg");
		parameters.put("lang", "0");
	}
	
	public void setUpLoader(){
		try{
			ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[]{new URL("http://world128.runescape.com/runescape.jar")});
			Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass("client");
			Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();
			loader.setStub(this);
			loader.init();
			loader.start();
			bot.add(loader);
			getContentPane().add(bot, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
	
	public static void main(String args[]){
		new RSLoader();
	}
	
	public void appletResize(int width, int height){
	}
	
	public final URL getCodeBase() {
		try{
			return new URL("http://world128.runescape.com/");
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			return null;
		}
	}
	
	public final URL getDocumentBase(){
		try{
			return new URL("http://world128.runescape.com/");
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			return null;
		}
	}
	
	public final String getParameter(String name){
		return parameters.get(name);
	}
	
	public final AppletContext getAppletContext(){
		return null;
	}
}

I get this error :

C:\Users\HP\Desktop\BOT>java RSLoader
ru
        at ve.a(Unknown Source)
        at client.init(Unknown Source)
        at RSLoader.setUpLoader(RSLoader.java:46)
        at RSLoader.<init>(RSLoader.java:28)
        at RSLoader.main(RSLoader.java:57)

Anyone have any idea why I get this ?.. The code is the same as the tutorial so I was wondering maybe jagex changed there system so it doesn’t work anymore ? Help please

Edit : Nvm fixed :)… If anyone get the same problem post and I will post code

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @jphamlett jphamlett
item.description:
@jphamlett wrote:

package Bot;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;

public final class RSLoader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

    private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters;

    static {
        parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();
        parameters.put("cabbase", "loader2091842078.cab");
        parameters.put("worldid", "65");
        parameters.put("members", "0");
        parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
        parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
        parameters.put("java_arguments", "-Xmx96m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true");
        parameters.put("colourid", "0");
        parameters.put("objecttag", "0");
        parameters.put("js", "0");
        parameters.put("game", "0");
        parameters.put("affid", "0");
        parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOfSioVfCQagIWtHEqGOCcTkj338a649PWg");
        parameters.put("country", "0");
        parameters.put("haveie6", "1");
        parameters.put("haveie6", "0");
        parameters.put("havefirefox", "0");
        parameters.put("cookieprefix", "0");
        parameters.put("cookiehost", "runescape.com");
        parameters.put("cachesubdirid", "0");
        parameters.put("crashurl", "http://www.runescape.com/slu.ws?j=0&crash=1");
        parameters.put("unsignedurl", "http://www.runescape.com/slu.ws?j=0");
    }

    public RSLoader() throws MalformedURLException, ClassNotFoundException, IllegalAccessException, InstantiationException {
        ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(
                new URL[]{new URL(
                        "http://world65.runescape.com/runescape.jar")

                });
        Applet loader = clientClassLoader.loadClass("client").asSubclass(Applet.class).newInstance();
        loader.setStub(this);
        super.setTitle("Runescape Loader ~ The Bank");
        JPanel theGame = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
        theGame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(768, 560));
        super.setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
        super.setSize(768, 560);
        loader.init();
        loader.start();
        theGame.add(loader);
        super.getContentPane().add(theGame, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    }

    public void appletResize(int width, int height) {

    }

    public URL getCodeBase() {
        try {
            return new URL("http://world65.runescape.com/");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }
    }

    public URL getDocumentBase() {
        return this.getCodeBase();
    }

    public String getParameter(String name) {
        return parameters.get(name);
    }

    public AppletContext getAppletContext() {
        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        try {
            new RSLoader().setVisible(true);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }
    }

}

why wont that work?

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“zzSLeepzz, post:99, topic:293439”]For noobs like, me, it appears that the code in the referenced link doesn’t comply yet with what was identified in http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431592.0.html. The code referred to appears to be specifying a user agent of:

urlc.setRequestProperty("User-Agent", "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.7) Gecko/20060909 Firefox/1.5.0.7");

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=388301.msg2932963#msg2932963 date=1251393513]

Take a look at the last three methods here:

http://cherokeeengine.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/cherokeeengine/src/com/cherokee/rs/rs2/RSClassExtractor.java?revision=32&view=markup

Named downloadJar(), parseParameters(), and loadPage(). They aren’t entirely correct, loadPage for example doesn’t load all of the images, scripts, and css files for example, but they are much better than doing it in a more naive way.
[/quote][/quote]

That is correct, because the post you quoted was made quite a time before the thread I made about how that is detectable.

Read full topic

That doesn’t look quite right…[/quote]
It makes sense. It sets haveie6 to 1 then to 0 since it knows it has firefox. Just remember: This is a map so the key is on the right and the value is on the left. owait.

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @jimmy5410 jimmy5410
item.description:
@jimmy5410 wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:90, topic:293439”][quote=tv-xxx]ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader( new URL[] { new URL( "http://world81.runescape.com/loader.jar") }); [/quote]
change that link to “http://world81.runescape.com/runescape.jar”

[quote=tv-xxx]Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass("loader");[/quote]change “loader” to “client”

you are attempting to load the signed client through loader.jar erroneously, so load it unsigned for now, and then search around the forums to find out as to how the signed client is loaded[/quote]
Mind explaining that?

Try this for the params

cabbase - loader2091842078.cab java_arguments - -Xmx96m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true colourid - 0 worldid - 65 modewhere - 0 modewhat - 0 lang - 0 objecttag - 0 js - 0 game - 0 affid - 0 settings - kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA country - 0 haveie6 - 1 haveie6 - 0 havefirefox - 1 cookieprefix - cookiehost - .runescape.com cachesubdirid - 0 crashurl - http://www.runescape.com/slu.ws?j=0&crash=1 unsignedurl - http://www.runescape.com/slu.ws?j=0
Where the thing on the left is the key and the thing on the right is the value.

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[code]ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader( new URL[] { new URL( "http://world81.runescape.com/loader.jar") }); [/code]
[s]change that link to "http://world81.runescape.com/runescape.jar"[/s]
[code]Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass("loader");[/code]
[s]change "loader" to "client"

you are attempting to load the signed client through loader.jar erroneously, so load it unsigned for now, and then search around the forums to find out as to how the signed client is loaded[/s]

edit: never mind, i was under the false assumption that the loader class did not hold Applet as its superclass

the problem probably lies within the fact that the client is requesting a certain parameter which you didnt hardcore into the map, therefore returning null, and thus, causing the client to throw an exception

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @jimmy5410 jimmy5410
item.description:
@jimmy5410 wrote:

[quote=“tv-xxx, post:87, topic:293439”]I used your old tutorial to make my first laoder why back when, and now it doesnt work, and ideas why?

[code]import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.awt.Toolkit;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;

public class Main extends javax.swing.JFrame implements java.applet.AppletStub {

private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();

public Main() {
	try {

        setSize(768, 534);
        setResizable(true);

        Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit();
        Dimension screenSize = toolkit.getScreenSize();
        int x = (screenSize.width - this.getWidth()) / 2;
        int y = (screenSize.height - this.getHeight()) / 2;
        setLocation(x, y);

		setTitle("Tvs Runescape Loader");
                    parameters.put("height", "762");
		parameters.put("width", "503");
		parameters.put("worldid", "81");
		parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
		parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
		parameters.put("members", "0");
		parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA");
		parameters.put("lang", "0");

		ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(
				new URL[] { new URL(
						"http://world81.runescape.com/loader.jar") });
		Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass("loader");
		Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();

		loader.setStub(this);
		loader.init();
		loader.start();

		JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
		JPanel theGame = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
		theGame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(769, 510));
		setPreferredSize(new Dimension(769, 510));
		theGame.add(loader);
		getContentPane().add(loader, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
        setVisible(true);
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public void appletResize(int width, int height) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub

}

public final URL getCodeBase() {
	try {
		return new URL("http://world81.runescape.com/");
	} catch (Exception e) {
		return null;
	}
}

public final URL getDocumentBase() {
	try {
		return new URL("http://world81.runescape.com/");
	} catch (Exception e) {
		return null;
	}
}

public final String getParameter(String name) {
	return parameters.get(name);
}

public final AppletContext getAppletContext() {
	return null;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
	new Main().setVisible(true);
}

}[/code][/quote]
params

item.title: [Tutorial] Making a loader v2
item.dc:creator: @tv-xxx tv-xxx
item.description:
@tv-xxx wrote:

I used your old tutorial to make my first laoder why back when, and now it doesnt work, and ideas why?

[code]import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.awt.Toolkit;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;

public class Main extends javax.swing.JFrame implements java.applet.AppletStub {

private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();

public Main() {
	try {

        setSize(768, 534);
        setResizable(true);

        Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit();
        Dimension screenSize = toolkit.getScreenSize();
        int x = (screenSize.width - this.getWidth()) / 2;
        int y = (screenSize.height - this.getHeight()) / 2;
        setLocation(x, y);

		setTitle("Tvs Runescape Loader");
                    parameters.put("height", "762");
		parameters.put("width", "503");
		parameters.put("worldid", "81");
		parameters.put("modewhat", "0");
		parameters.put("modewhere", "0");
		parameters.put("members", "0");
		parameters.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA");
		parameters.put("lang", "0");

		ClassLoader clientClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(
				new URL[] { new URL(
						"http://world81.runescape.com/loader.jar") });
		Class<?> clientClass = clientClassLoader.loadClass("loader");
		Applet loader = (Applet) clientClass.newInstance();

		loader.setStub(this);
		loader.init();
		loader.start();

		JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
		JPanel theGame = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
		theGame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(769, 510));
		setPreferredSize(new Dimension(769, 510));
		theGame.add(loader);
		getContentPane().add(loader, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
        setVisible(true);
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public void appletResize(int width, int height) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub

}

public final URL getCodeBase() {
	try {
		return new URL("http://world81.runescape.com/");
	} catch (Exception e) {
		return null;
	}
}

public final URL getDocumentBase() {
	try {
		return new URL("http://world81.runescape.com/");
	} catch (Exception e) {
		return null;
	}
}

public final String getParameter(String name) {
	return parameters.get(name);
}

public final AppletContext getAppletContext() {
	return null;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
	new Main().setVisible(true);
}

}[/code]
